verses.text: \w But|strong="H6030"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

O \w that|strong="H3863"\w* \w my|strong="H5375"\w* \w sins|strong="H3162"\w*, whereby I \w have|strong="H5375"\w* deserved wrath, \w and|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* calamity \w that|strong="H3863"\w* I \w suffer|strong="H5375"\w*, were \w weighed|strong="H8254"\w* \w in|strong="H5375"\w* \w a|strong="H5375"\w* \w balance|strong="H3976"\w*.

\w As|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sand|strong="H2344"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w would|strong="H1697"\w* appear \w heavier|strong="H3513"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* full \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H5921"\w*:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Lord \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H8354"\w* \w me|strong="H5978"\w*, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w rage|strong="H2534"\w* whereof drinketh \w up|strong="H6186"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, \w and|strong="H8354"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w terrors|strong="H1161"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Lord war against \w me|strong="H5978"\w*.

\w Will|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wild|strong="H6501"\w* ass \w bray|strong="H5101"\w* \w when|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* hath \w grass|strong="H1877"\w*? \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \w low|strong="H1600"\w* \w when|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* standeth \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* full manger?

\w Or|strong="H0518"\w* \w can|strong="H0518"\w* \w an|strong="H3426"\w* unsavoury thing be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*, \w that|strong="H0518"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w not|strong="H0518"\w* seasoned \w with|strong="H0398"\w* \w salt|strong="H4417"\w*? \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w can|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* man \w taste|strong="H2940"\w* \w that|strong="H0518"\w* which \w when|strong="H0518"\w* tasted bringeth death?

\w The|strong="H5060"\w* \w things|strong="H1992"\w* \w which|strong="H3899"\w* before \w my|strong="H5060"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w would|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H5315"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w*, now, through anguish \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w my|strong="H5060"\w* meats.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H4310"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w request|strong="H7596"\w* \w may|strong="H4310"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H4310"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w* \w may|strong="H4310"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w what|strong="H4310"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* look \w for|strong="H5414"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w that|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w that|strong="H3027"\w* hath begun may destroy \w me|strong="H1214"\w*, \w that|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* may let loose \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w cut|strong="H1214"\w* \w me|strong="H1214"\w* \w off|strong="H1214"\w*?

\w And|strong="H5750"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w comfort|strong="H5165"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* afflicting \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H1961"\w* sorrow, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w spare|strong="H2550"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* contradict \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w* \w of|strong="H6918"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* hold \w out|strong="H4100"\w*? \w or|strong="H3588"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w end|strong="H7093"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* keep patience?

\w My|strong="H0518"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w is|strong="H1320"\w* \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w of|strong="H0068"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, \w nor|strong="H0518"\w* \w is|strong="H1320"\w* \w my|strong="H0518"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w of|strong="H0068"\w* brass.

Behold \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w help|strong="H5833"\w* \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w in|strong="H4480"\w* myself, \w and|strong="H5080"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* familiar friends \w also|strong="H0518"\w* \w are|strong="H0369"\w* departed \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.

He that taketh away mercy from \w his|strong="H7453"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*, forsaketh \w the|strong="H3374"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* \w of|strong="H3374"\w* \w the|strong="H3374"\w* \w Lord|strong="H2617"\w*.

My \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w have|strong="H0251"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H0251"\w* \w me|strong="H3644"\w*, \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w the|strong="H0251"\w* torrent \w that|strong="H5674"\w* passeth swiftly \w in|strong="H0251"\w* \w the|strong="H0251"\w* \w valleys|strong="H5158"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H4480"\w* fear \w the|strong="H5921"\w* hoary \w frost|strong="H7140"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w snow|strong="H7950"\w* shall fall \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

At \w the|strong="H6256"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w when|strong="H6256"\w* \w they|strong="H6256"\w* shall \w be|strong="H6256"\w* scattered \w they|strong="H6256"\w* shall perish: \w and|strong="H4725"\w* after \w it|strong="H4725"\w* groweth \w hot|strong="H2527"\w* \w they|strong="H6256"\w* shall \w be|strong="H6256"\w* melted \w out|strong="H1846"\w* \w of|strong="H4725"\w* \w their|strong="H6256"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1870"\w* \w paths|strong="H0734"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w their|strong="H1870"\w* steps \w are|strong="H1870"\w* entangled: \w they|strong="H1870"\w* shall \w walk|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* vain, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*.

\w Consider|strong="H5027"\w* \w the|strong="H5027"\w* \w paths|strong="H0734"\w* \w of|strong="H0734"\w* Thema, \w the|strong="H5027"\w* \w ways|strong="H0734"\w* \w of|strong="H0734"\w* Saba, \w and|strong="H7614"\w* \w wait|strong="H6960"\w* a little while.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* are \w confounded|strong="H2659"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0982"\w* hoped: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* are \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w also|strong="H3588"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* unto \w me|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* are \w covered|strong="H0954"\w* \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w shame|strong="H0954"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w*: \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* affliction \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3808"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*.

Did \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Bring|strong="H3051"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H1157"\w*, \w and|strong="H0559"\w* \w give|strong="H3051"\w* \w me|strong="H1157"\w* \w of|strong="H0559"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* substance?

\w Or|strong="H3027"\w* \w deliver|strong="H4422"\w* \w me|strong="H6299"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* enemy, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w rescue|strong="H6299"\w* \w me|strong="H6299"\w* \w out|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* mighty?

\w Teach|strong="H3384"\w* \w me|strong="H0995"\w*, \w and|strong="H0995"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* hold \w my|strong="H4100"\w* peace: \w and|strong="H0995"\w* if \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* been ignorant \w in|strong="H0995"\w* any thing, \w instruct|strong="H3384"\w* \w me|strong="H0995"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* have \w you|strong="H4480"\w* detracted \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* truth, whereas there \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w none|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w reprove|strong="H3198"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*?

\w You|strong="H3198"\w* dress \w up|strong="H4405"\w* speeches only \w to|strong="H2803"\w* \w rebuke|strong="H3198"\w*, \w and|strong="H7307"\w* \w you|strong="H3198"\w* utter \w words|strong="H0561"\w* \w to|strong="H2803"\w* \w the|strong="H2803"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* rush \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, \w and|strong="H7453"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* endeavour \w to|strong="H5921"\w* overthrow \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*.

\w However|strong="H0518"\w* finish \w what|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H0518"\w* begun, give ear, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w see|strong="H0518"\w* \w whether|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w lie|strong="H3576"\w*.

\w Answer|strong="H7725"\w*, \w I|strong="H1961"\w* \w beseech|strong="H4994"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w*, \w without|strong="H0408"\w* contention: \w and|strong="H7725"\w* speaking \w that|strong="H1961"\w* which \w is|strong="H6664"\w* \w just|strong="H6664"\w*, judge ye.

\w And|strong="H0995"\w* \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w And|strong="H0995"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H0518"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* folly \w sound|strong="H2441"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H0518"\w* \w mouth|strong="H2441"\w*.
